'''Honey-Glazed Ceviche''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Sour Sauce Ceviche]] with [[Ororon]]. The [[recipe]] for Sour Sauce Ceviche is obtained from the {{Quest|A Saurian Lover's Ordinary Days}}.

Honey-Glazed Ceviche increases the party's attack by '''114''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
